text: Jurandir de Freitas (12 November 1940 – 6 March 1996), nicknamed Jurandir, was a Brazilian footballer who played as a defender. ==Honours== ===Club=== São Paulo *Campeonato Paulista: 1970, 1971 ===International=== Brazil *FIFA World Cup: 1962 *South American Access Championship: 1962 Category:1940 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Footballers from Marília
title: Jurandir (footballer, born 1940)
